A Modern Take on Greek Cuisine

Mourayo is a lovely Greek restaurant in the Dupont Circle area that is quietly doing elegant, modern Mediterranean food. No flaming cheeses or waiters yelling "opa!" here. Instead, enjoy exquisite food without the fuss. The chargrilled octopus in an ink vinaigrette served with mashed fava is smokey perfection.

In the busy dining area of Dupont Circle the Mourayo (Greek) Restaurant sits among many. This small restaurant with galley style seating is easy to miss. But be sure to stop and dine. The offerings are goumet renditions of Greek dishes wonderfully cooked and served.
